description: Designed with an ultra-compact form factor, the Patriot Memory Autobahn is the best solution for those looking for both excellent USB 2.0 performance and high capacity in an extremely portable storage device. Plug in the Patriot Memory Autobahn and it becomes barely noticeable as it is made to sit flush against the device with no protruding body to catch snags. Rock your tunes with ease, the Patriot Memory Autobahn is plug and play compatible with stereos that support a USB connection. The Autobahn is available in 8GB, 16GB and 32GB capacities, so perfect for carrying your favorite songs with you wherever you go. The Patriot Memory Autobahn is compatible with Windows® 8, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista®, Windows® XP, Windows® 2000, Windows® ME, Linux 2.4 and later, Mac® OS9, X and later. Backed by Patriot Memory’s award winning customer service, the Autobahn comes with a 2-year warranty.
title: Patriot 8GB Autobahn Series Ultra Compact USB 2.0 Flash Drive - PSF8GLSABUSB
